channel.title: Fixing NPC drop rate
channel.description:
I know you can fix the overall server drop rate from setting file which I have set too 10. Don't know if I should of kept 1, suggestions? But besides that do I have to change every npc to the drop rate I want? Or is there something somewhere in a java file that is like low npcs = 1/3 regular = 1/10 high = 1/500. Some people saying they getting good drops some saying no, is it patience? is 10 drop rate overall good and i do not have to edit anything? thanks in advanced..
--Nick

item.title: Fixing NPC drop rate
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Rewrite the drop system… There should be only 5 drop types. ALWAYS, COMMON, UNCOMMON, RARE, VERY_RARE assign each drop type a percentage rate (1-100 obviously?) and go from there. Then you can do

“npcdrop = 1 995 1 ALWAYS
npcdrop = 1 4151 1 VERY_RARE” etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing NPC drop rate
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

Mind telling us what base and revision?

Read full topic
